input.sentences: the kids were all ready for the parade .
they brought all their flags with them .
they had some other groups marching also .
output.sentences: Every Independence day I take the kids to the park and we put on our summer clothes and carry flags.
This year the marching band looked especially spruce and natty in their black and white.
Many people brought lawn chairs, because the parade lasts for quite a while, as a lot of organizations participate and like to carry banners and advertise themselves.
It's always a good time and usually we have hotdogs and hamburgers later.
Next year our oldest is playing in a band and might even get to be a part of the parade.
